[00:00.44]Cold Heart (PNAU Remix) - Elton John/Dua Lipa
[00:01.41]Lyrics by：Nicholas Littlemore/Peter Mayes/Sam Littlemore/Elton John/Bernie Taupin
[00:03.10]Composed by：Nicholas Littlemore/Peter Mayes/Sam Littlemore/Elton John/Bernie Taupin
[00:05.37]Elton John：
[00:05.98]
[00:15.52]It's a human sign
[00:17.83]
[00:19.57]When things go wrong
[00:22.02]
[00:23.57]When the scent of her lingers
[00:26.15]
[00:27.65]And temptation's strong
[00:30.01]
[00:32.25]Cold cold heart
[00:33.96]
[00:36.04]Hardened by you
[00:38.50]
[00:40.09]Some things lookin' better baby
[00:43.71]
[00:44.29]Just passin' through
[00:46.88]
[00:47.52]Oh no no no no
[00:48.86]Dua Lipa：
[00:49.17]
[00:50.38]And I think it's gonna be a long long time
[00:54.65]'Til touchdown brings me 'round again to find
[00:58.34]
[00:58.87]I'm not the man they think I am at home
[01:02.66]Oh no no no
[01:04.77]
